content.question: The most likely explanation for the results shown in Graph I is that

choices.label: pH affects the shape of the active site of the enzyme
pH affects the temperature of the reaction
the enzyme has a quaternary structure
pH affects the primary structure of the enzyme

content.answer: pH affects the shape of the active site of the enzyme

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
